welcome_message_body: Welcome to Cannock, a charming town known for its beautiful countryside, rich history, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this lovely city has to offer during your stay.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Birmingham Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Birmingham Airport serves mainly low-cost airlines.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Birmingham Airport serves mainly charter and holiday flights.

wifi.note: Unlimited free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at East Midlands Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at East Midlands Airport, primarily serving low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.
